songs.title: Sanctity
songs.lyrics:
My heart pulls towards you
My words burn my throat
I'm so deprived
Lover I once wrote
Swallow my silence
My head is full of dreams
I had of you once
Don't know what they might mean
You're listening
But you refuse to see
You don't understand what you mean to me

I was walking through the woodland
Saw a fallow deer
I noticed
Once closer
She knew that I was near
Bleeding her face was
Her antlers molting
I didn't mean to
Scare her away

I want this to work
Carve our love into stone
You see I am with you
But I'm always alone
